Pre-Game Insights: The Orlando Magic are looking to end their three-game road slide against the Toronto Raptors.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Raptors are 5-15 against Eastern Conference opponents and 3-19 against opponents with a winning record.
The Magic are 16-10 in Eastern Conference play and at the bottom of the league shooting 30.6% from 3-point range.
The Raptors are shooting 46.2% from the field this season, 0.2 percentage points lower than the 46.4% the Magic allow to opponents.
The Magic's 44.8% shooting percentage from the field this season is 2.3 percentage points lower than the Raptors have given up to their opponents (47.1%).
Others: RJ Barrett is averaging 23.4 points, 6.8 rebounds, and 6.2 assists for the Raptors.
Goga Bitadze is scoring 9.9 points per game and averaging 8.3 rebounds for the Magic.
Bruce Brown is day to day with a knee injury, and RJ Barrett is day to day with an illness for the Raptors.

Paolo Banchero is out with an oblique injury, Anthony Black is day to day with a back injury, Franz Wagner is out with an oblique injury, Moritz Wagner is out for the season with a knee injury, and Trevelin Queen is day to day with an illness for the Magic.
